ygData.subject: Re: Unfair advantage...
ygData.msgSnippet: Not to mention the fact that some zone slower than others (I know only too well myself). -Qefnir, Tarew Marr Bard of the 14th composition ... From: Talies the
ygData.messageBody:
Not to mention the fact that some zone slower than others (I know only too
well myself).

-Qefnir, Tarew Marr Bard of the 14th composition

----- Original Message -----
From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, July 02, 1999 4:07 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Unfair advantage...


: From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>
:
: I just noticed the announcement for the High Moon Festival on Povar. (for
: those not privy, go to
: http://everquest.station.sony.com/n_news.html#news0702c )
:
: During this Festival, one of the events will be an "Iron man" race:
:
: Event Name: Iron Man Marathon
: Description: This event is open to all
: races and classes. The race will
: start at the West Gates of Freeport with
: the contestants having to run
: through at least 2 zones to a finishing
: point. Before the race begins
: participants will be told the race route
: and the finishing point. Don't
: worry, it will be a point that most are
: aware of. The first person to reach
: the finishing point wins the race. To
: make sure everyone starts off on
: even footing all contestants will have
: SoW cast on them in order to
: prevent someone from having an unfair
: advantage. More rules will be
: made available before the Marathon
begins
: by the Marathon Coordinator.
:
: Prize: Glowing Crook Staff
:
: Wow!!! But... um.. SoW, huh? Is it just me, or can a Bard with a drum
: outrun SoW any day of the week? Not to mention what we're hearing about
: this battledrum....
:
: Methinks a Povar Bard will win this competition if he's smart ;)
:
: Talies the Wanderer
: Bristlebane
:
:
:
: --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------

: Looking to expand your world?

: ONElist has 180,000 e-mail communities from which to choose!
